text.div:
ActMoodIntent

An intention or plan to perform a service. Historical note: in previous RIM versions, the intent mood was captured as a separate class hierarchy, called Service_intent_or_order.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include codes from http://hl7.org/fhir/v3/ActMood where concept is-a INT

name: ActMoodIntent
description: An intention or plan to perform a service. Historical note: in previous RIM versions, the intent mood was captured as a separate class hierarchy, called Service_intent_or_order.
